mapper.insert: insert into ZT_TRADE (ID, COMPANY_CODE, TRADE_DATE, OPEN, CLOSE, HIGH, LOW, VOL) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{open,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{close,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{high,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{low,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{vol,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update ZT_TRADE set COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_DATE = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN = #{open,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CLOSE = #{close,jdbcType=BIGINT}, HIGH = #{high,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LOW = #{low,jdbcType=BIGINT}, VOL = #{vol,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, COMPANY_CODE, TRADE_DATE, OPEN, CLOSE, HIGH, LOW, VOL from ZT_TRADE
